SceneConfig.HintEnableSegueScene: Enable Segue transition for this scene ^
SceneConfig.HintTextToDisplay: Text to display during the transition. (shift+enter for newline)
SceneConfig.HintTextSize: The font size of the displayed text in pixels (10 - 200)
SceneConfig.HintTextColor: The color of the displayed text
SceneConfig.HintFontFamily: The font family used for the displayed text
SceneConfig.HintSceneFadeInDuration: Duration for this scene to fade in (in milliseconds)
SceneConfig.HintTextFadeInDuration: Duration of text fade in. Note: When Text to Display is blank, this setting has no effect
SceneConfig.HintTextDisplayDuration: Time for the text to be displayed before beginning fade out (in milliseconds)
SceneConfig.HintTextFadeOutDuration: Time for the text to fade out (in milliseconds)
SceneConfig.HintSceneFadeOutDuration: Time for the currently active scene to fade out (in milliseconds)
